It is so noisy that opening the sliding doors is not possible. Loud bangs, the constant beep-beep-beep of trucks backing up and construction equipment did not make for a peaceful vacation stay. If this had been a business stay, it would not have mattered because we would have needed to be up early anyway. Also, the housekeeping staff is extremely noisy. Instead pf placing their carts in front of the rooms, they throw the locks and bang the doors as they go in and out many times. It's quite distracting. The breakfast buffet needs to be re-organized to accommodate a full house. It was difficult to get around people to get food and drink since there was very little space in between the set-up.

Amazing service. Great rooms. Good food and the best location. Two blocks from the beach, rooms offer ocean and mountain views. The best value in Waikiki. You feel safe and the breakfast is delicious!!!!!!!!!

We are LOCALS or KA'AMAINAS. As you enter the hotel there is a drive up VALET service waiting to assit you. The LOBBY is very INVITING & PLEASING to the eye. FRONT DESK CLERK LYNN assisted us in checking in. Although there were problems with the wI-FI SERVERS for reservations & we waited for 2 hours before having a room. When we got to the room it was so elegant & comfortable it was worth the wait. Thanks Lynn.

Our family of four just spent four days at the Hyatt place. We usually stay right along the main strip I'm Waikiki but all the hotels were sold out for Christmas. My husband got a great deal here and in turn we enjoyed the newly renovated hotel. The staff was very friendly and personable, they greeted us upon arrival and departures daily. Our room was on the 19th floor, we had 2 queens, the room was very clean and spacious. I enjoyed everything being so new! The morning breakfast that was included was convenient. The short walk to the beach was also very easy. I would consider staying here again. Great fit for our traveling family with to young kids.

Stayed here for a week. If you are loking for a place to just take naps, get a shower and sleep for the night, this is the place. If you are looking to be pampered, then this is not the place for you. There are plenty of others around that would fit that need. But like I said we were in Hawaii to experience the outdoors. The hotel was insignificant. But it was nice enough and the value was tremendous. It is close to Waikik beach (overated) and the zoo (eh). Got a bad smelling room at first, but they changed us with little issue.

The room was very spacious and clean. We were able to get a great deal through Hotwire, so we definately got our money's worth. The complimentary breakfast was delicious, providing fresh fruit and hot entrees. The staff were friendly and courteous. We have stayed at numerous locations in Wakikiki and this was one of the quietest locations. It is also situated in a great location, with a beautiful ocean view.

Just returned from a week long vacation in Hawaii with 3 kids and wife. We were happily surprised to discover this new hotel, a stone's throw from Waikiki beach, with a large room to accommodate my whole family and offering a hearty complimentary breakfast. The staff was very cordial and helpful in planning our day activities. They offered free wi-fi and let me use their printer for no charge. The only pinch I felt was on $25/night valet parking charge but their staff directed me to a public self parking garage across the street for $10/ day with full in-out privileges. They made our Waikiki stay very pleasant and we will be sure to stay there on the next trip too.

Newly Renovated Room Great! comfortable beds, Love the the complimentary Breakfast choices! hot meals for breakfast was the best deal with the room. Yes, work out room too. Decor is all Modern love it. Lobby beautiful, great and helpful staff. Starbucks coffee 24hrs as well as more meals for purchase in the lobby, too. Oh yes, night cap any one? small lobby bar kind of cute.We were pleased great service and friendly "Aloha" staff all around. Its a Hyatt Place but not so snobby as Hyatt, this one is a more comfortable.Hyatt quality with real Aloha. Great Job on the renovation everything is brand new. We will be back. Keep up the Aloha.
Get the Ocean View-It is worth the upgrade. Diamond head and International Shopping Center are near by. Staff is first class.
